get.description: Establishes a WebSocket connection with Genesys Cloud Audio Connector for real-time voice bot integration. Uses the AudioHook protocol with JSON control messages and binary audio frames.

parameters.description: Agent ID to handle the call
parameters.name: agent_id

parameters.description: Shadow/draft agent ID for preview mode
parameters.name: draft_agent_id

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid API key

get.description: Establishes a bidirectional WebSocket connection for real-time voice communication with an AI agent. Audio is streamed as base64-encoded -law at 8kHz. Authentication is performed via Sec-WebSocket-Protocol header with format: "token, <access_token>". This ensures tokens are never exposed in URLs or logs.

parameters.description: Shadow/draft agent ID to use for instructions/tools during preview
parameters.name: draft_agent_id

parameters.description: Caller identifier (e.g., phone number or user ID)
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: Mark this as a synthetic/test call (default: false)
parameters.name: synthetic

dashboard_id.description: Currently active dashboard (custom if set, otherwise main)

collection_ids.description: Optional: specific collection IDs to export (empty = all)

dashboard_id.description: nil to clear and revert to main dashboard

is_read_only.description: True for default dashboard, false for tenant's custom dashboards

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

base_skill_id.description: BaseSkillID references the always-available skill (association is internal only)

use_experimental_model.description: TODO: Remove after migration hits all environments -->

forward_number.description: Can be phone number or SIP URI (e.g., "sip:branch@provider.com")

task_model.description: TaskModel overrides the model used for task/background orchestrators.

channel_breakdown_enabled.description:
ChannelBreakdownEnabled controls whether the channel breakdown UI is shown.
nil = infer from data (legacy), true = show breakdown, false = hide breakdown

selected_provider.description:
SelectedProvider tracks which TTS provider is explicitly selected.
Valid values: "deepdub", "elevenlabs", "cartesia", "azure", "deepgram", "minimax", "google", "gradium"

channels.description: Channels: Number of audio channels. Default: 1 (mono)

detect_language.description:
DetectLanguage: Auto-detect spoken language. Default: false
Useful for multilingual agents. Returns detected language in response.

encoding.description:
Encoding: Audio format. Default: "mulaw" for telephony
Options: linear16, mulaw, alaw, opus

endpointing.description: Endpointing: Speech boundary detection in milliseconds (nil = use default 10ms)

filler_words.description:
FillerWords: Detect filler words like "uh", "um", "mhm". Default: false
Useful for call quality analysis and speaker behavior tracking.

interim_results.description: InterimResults: Stream partial results as speech is happening. CRITICAL for real-time.

keywords.description:
Keywords: Boost recognition of specific terms (e.g., product names, jargon)
For nova-3, these are sent as "keyterm" (contextual prompting)
For nova-2 and older, these are sent as "keywords" (word boosting)

profanity_filter.description: ProfanityFilter: Replace profane words with asterisks. Default: false

punctuate.description: Punctuate: Add punctuation marks. Makes text readable.

redact.description:
Redact: Mask sensitive data in transcript. Default: "" (disabled)
Options: "pci" (credit cards), "numbers" (all numbers), "ssn" (social security),
"true" (all PII including names, dates, addresses)

replace.description:
Replace: Find and replace patterns for post-processing (format: "find:replace")
Useful for fixing common misrecognitions

sample_rate.description: SampleRate: Audio sample rate in Hz. Default: 8000 for telephony

smart_format.description: SmartFormat: Intelligent formatting for dates, times, numbers, currency, phone numbers

utterance_end_ms.description: UtteranceEndMs: Silence duration (ms) to detect end of speech.

container.description: Container: wav, mp3, ogg, flac, none (default: none for raw audio)

encoding.description: Encoding: linear16, mulaw, alaw (default: mulaw for telephony)

ignore_diacritics.description:
IgnoreDiacritics when true uses plain text instead of phonemized text for synthesis.
This can be useful when the phonemization process introduces unwanted diacritics or pronunciation marks.

announcement_type.description:
AnnouncementType determines how announcements are generated:
- "auto": infer from content (legacy behavior)
- "ai_generated": use AI/LLM to generate announcements
- "fixed": use predefined announcement messages

natural_announcement.description:
NaturalAnnouncement provides additional context for AI-generated announcements
(e.g., "routing operation" or "technical process")

language.description:
========== Common options ==========
Language is the BCP-47 language code (e.g., "en-US", "es-ES", "fr-FR").
For Gemini TTS: Affects the accent even when speaking other languages.
For Chirp 3: HD: Embedded in voice name, affects voice characteristics.
When empty, falls back to agent locale at runtime.

region.description: Region selects the regional endpoint. Empty uses global (recommended).

speaking_rate.description:
========== Chirp 3: HD specific options ==========
SpeakingRate: 0.25-4.0 (default: 1.0). Rate of speech. (Chirp 3: HD only)

style_prompt.description:
========== Gemini TTS specific options ==========
StylePrompt is a natural language description of the desired speaking style. (Gemini TTS only)
Examples: "Speak in a cheerful and friendly tone", "Use a calm, professional voice",
  "Speak slowly and clearly as if explaining to a child"

use_native_8khz.description:
UseNative8kHz when true requests 8kHz MULAW audio directly from Google (lower latency, no resampling).
When false (default), requests 24kHz LINEAR16 and resamples to 8kHz (higher quality).

region.description: Region is the server region for lower latency: "eu" (Europe) or "us" (USA), default "eu"

rewrite_rules.description:
RewriteRules enables text normalization (numbers, dates, times) by language code: "en", "fr", "de", etc.
Maps to Gradium API parameter "rewrite_rules"

speed.description:
Speed controls speech rate: -4.0 (fastest) to 4.0 (slowest), default 0.0
Maps to Gradium API parameter "padding_bonus"

stability.description:
Stability controls voice consistency: 0 (deterministic) to 1.4 (varied)
Maps to Gradium API parameter "temp"
nil = use Gradium default (0.7), pointer to value = explicit setting (including 0)

voice_id.description: VoiceId is the Gradium voice identifier (required)

voice_similarity.description:
VoiceSimilarity controls cloned voice fidelity: 1.0 (loose) to 4.0 (strict)
Maps to Gradium API parameter "cfg_coef"
nil = use Gradium default (2.0), pointer to value = explicit setting

min_heard_percentage_for_substantial.description:
MinHeardPercentageForSubstantial is the minimum percentage (0.0-1.0) of the response that must be heard.
When nil or 0, uses default of 0.5.

min_words_for_substantial.description:
MinWordsForSubstantial is the minimum number of words for an interrupt to be considered substantial.
When nil or 0, uses default of 3.

notify_llm_of_heard_text.description:
NotifyLLMOfHeardText controls whether to tell the LLM what was heard before interrupt.
When nil, uses global config default.

x-enum-comments.IssueStatusDeleted: This is a special status for deleted issues, it is not a valid status for an issue.

x-enum-descriptions: This is a special status for deleted issues, it is not a valid status for an issue.

x-enum-comments.MetricConditionOperatorNot: Conversation does not have this tag

x-enum-descriptions: Conversation does not have this tag

x-enum-comments.MetricEvaluationStatusFalse: Does not match metric rules, not excluded

x-enum-descriptions: Does not match metric rules, not excluded

emotion.description: Emotion: happy, sad, angry, fearful, disgusted, surprised (optional, turbo models only)

language_boost.description: LanguageBoost enables language detection boost for multilingual content

model.description: Model is the TTS model (default: "speech-2.6-turbo" for low latency)

use_native_8khz.description:
UseNative8kHz when true requests 8kHz audio directly from MiniMax (lower latency, no resampling).
When false (default), requests 24kHz and resamples to 8kHz (higher quality).

voice_id.description: VoiceId is the MiniMax voice identifier (required)

enum_values.description: User defines the values for the parameter.

value.description: User defines the value for the parameter. or leaves it empty for the LLM to fill it.

context.description:
Context can be either:
- A plain string for v2 models (e.g., "medical conversation")
- A JSON object for v3 models (e.g., {"context":[{"phrases":["medical"],"boost":20}]})
- A JSON string that will be parsed for v3 models

Context can be either:
- A plain string for v2 models (e.g., "medical conversation")
- A JSON object for v3 models (e.g., {"context":[{"phrases":["medical"],"boost":20}]})
- A JSON string that will be parsed for v3 models

input_text_tokens.description: Audio token breakdown (OpenAI Realtime API specific)

debounce_window_ms.description:
DebounceWindowMs is how long to wait for more messages before processing (sync channels only).
Default is 800ms.

exclusion_rules_count.description: Computed: total number of conditions in exclusion rules

rules_count.description: Computed: total number of conditions in rules

with_exclusion_rules.description: Count of metrics with at least one exclusion rule

with_rules.description: Count of metrics with at least one rule

total_duration_ms.description: Sum of all interaction durations in milliseconds

with_llm_enabled.description: Count of tags with LLM enabled

with_rules.description: Count of tags with at least one rule

date_granularity.description: granularity for first group_by column (hour, day, week, month)

column.description: Column to aggregate (optional for count, required for count_distinct)

filter.description: For percentage: filter for the numerator (e.g., positive sentiment)

type.description: count, count_distinct, sum, avg, min, max, percentage

stats.description: Map of agent ID to stats

time_series.description: Optional: Map of agent ID to time series

agent_ids.description: List of agent IDs to fetch stats for

include_time_series.description: If true, include daily interaction counts

chat_count.description: Number of chat interactions on this date

count.description: Total number of interactions on this date

email_count.description: Number of email interactions on this date

voice_count.description: Number of voice interactions on this date

date_granularity.description: granularity for first group_by column (hour, day, week, month)

content.example: Hello, how can I help you today?

exclusion_rules.description: Pointer to allow setting to empty array

rules.description: Pointer to allow setting to empty array
Pointer to allow setting to empty array
